Room.Name: Wakeforest Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Wakeforest Drive, between the Wakarimasu Park.
Room.LongDescription: The massive Wakarimasu Park was built nearly two decades ago with the unclaimed land on the north side of Oceancrest Avenue. Since that plot of land was the first thing seen by visitors to Oceancrest, the City decided to build an elegant park, which spans approximately two city blocks.
